name: Marid
movement: walk 30 ft., fly 60 ft., swim 90 ft.
description: The Marid is a large elemental creature resembling a powerful being of water, capable of both melee and magical combat. It has an impressive physique with muscular build, embodying the essence of water.
memorable: It combines physical prowess with magical versatility, capable of manipulating water and summoning allies.
goals: Typically aims to dominate aquatic environments and can act as both adversary and ally in conflicts.
relations: Could be found alongside other water elemental creatures and may serve as a powerful ally or adversary to adventurers.
environment: Usually found in aquatic locales or near bodies of water.
strengths: Resistant to acid, cold, and lightning damage; can breathe both air and water.
weaknesses: Mobile yet vulnerable to physical attacks if caught off guard outside water.
attacks: Utilizes multiattack with trident strikes delivering piercing and lightning damage, can also use nets to restrain foes.
most_powerful_ability: The ability to create a Water Jet that can push enemies away and knock them prone while causing significant bludgeoning damage.
equipment: Trident, capable of returning when thrown.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 30 feet, allowing it to detect creatures without needing to see them.
skills: Has proficiency in perception and persuasion, making it a formidable social combatant.
additional_information: Can use Fog Cloud to obscure areas, allowing for tactical surprises.
Innate spellcasting enhances its versatility and battlefield control.
The Marid can alter its form using 'alter self' to adapt to combat needs.
Powerful enough to summon water elementals to aid in battle.
Strong saving throws in Constitution and Charisma.
spellcasting: Innate spellcasting ability allowing for multiple spells related to water manipulation and control.
test_queries: large water elemental with magical abilities
creature that can summon allies in water
marid with trident that returns when thrown
elemental that creates fog clouds in battle
aquatic monster with high physical strength and spells
